instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A2780 Display replace
threads.message:
got a brandnew 16" 2023 A2780 display broken. it will be needfull to replace the display and the topcase.

can you tell me, if i replace it with a used one can that resume in problems? Is the display serialized with the board? need som informations please

threads.title: A2780 Display replace
threads.message: You will need to change the chips from T-CON!
